Program Description: rebate up to $2000 based on Heat Pump SEER value
Rebate Value: 15 SEER Heat Pump — $200 Rebate; 16 SEER Heat Pump — $750 Rebate; 17 SEER Heat Pump — $1,500 Rebate; Greater Than 17 SEER Heat Pump — $2,000 Rebate
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Heat Pump range from 15 SEER to greater than 17 SEER
Other Restrictions: for greater than 15 SEER heat pumps, members will be required to submit a W-9. Rebate applications must be submitted within 365 days of unit installation
